message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product that I'm sure you'll love. I believe we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. My initial offer is $1200000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. My counteroffer would be $900000.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I have to consider my own value for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. My counteroffer is $1100000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, my counteroffer would be $1000000.
I'm getting close to my minimum value for the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target. My counteroffer is $1150000.
I understand your position, Alice. Given the current market conditions and my financial constraints, my final counteroffer would be $1050000.

I'm not willing to go any lower than $1200000, Bob. I think this is my final concession. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to explore other options. My final counteroffer is $1200000.
